dublin_core.dcvalue: inScale uses images and audio to train CHWs on consultation steps to assess, classify, treat and refer patients. The decision support tool includes a checklist of mild and severe signs of diarrhea, pneumonia and malaria and provides treatment guidance. The application also collects weekly case data and drug stock levels that are sent to a central server.

Karin Kallander, Program Coordinator, Malaria Consortium, Email: k.kallander@malariaconsortium.org | Paulin Basinga, Senior Program Officer, Gates Foundation, Email: paulin.basinga@gatesfoundation.org
